arStrings.szText: When {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} ends, gain {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}({Shield:BARRIER_TOOLTIP}){/c} as a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds for each enemy you {c_important}{u}Froze{/u}{/c} while it was active.
When {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} ends, your Non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldowns are reduced by {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c}.
